attributes.additional_details: We believe puppy farming is cruel practice and that those who intensively breed dogs for money should face criminal fines and sentences.
attributes.background: Puppy farming uses dogs to breed for money. We believe the people running the farms often don't care about the dogs' welfare and will get dogs impregnated over and over again to make as much money as possible, even if this endangers the dog's health.

departments.name: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs
